select notice_n_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice(n_no, n_title, n_content, n_date, n_readcount, n_img, user_id) values (#{nNo},#{nTitle},#{nContent},sysdate,#{nReadcount},#{nImg},#{userId})
mapper.update: update notice set n_readcount=n_readcount+1 where n_no=#{nNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from notice where n_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (select rownum idx, s.* from (select n_no, n_title, n_content, n_date, n_readcount, n_img, user_id from notice where n_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by n_no desc) s ) where idx >= #{pageStart} and idx <= #{pageEnd}
